languages.text: {n}Слабая улыбка возникает на губах Джай. Осторожно, словно вы — хрустальн{mf|ый|ая}, они касаются вашей щеки. Тихий шепот щекочет ваш слух:{/n} "Спасибо тебе, шерин. За все, что между нами было".
{n}A wan smile appears on Jae's face. Carefully, as though you were made of glass, she touches your cheeks. A whisper wafts toward your ears:{/n} "Thank you, shereen. For everything we had."
languages.original_text: {n}Слабая улыбка возникает на губах Джай. Осторожно, словно вы — хрустальн{mf|ый|ая}, они касаются вашей щеки. Тихий шепот щекочет ваш слух:{/n} "Спасибо тебе, шерин. За все, что между нами было".

traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}婕伊脸上露出了惨淡的笑容。她小心翼翼地抚摸着你的脸颊，仿佛你是玻璃做的一般。你耳边传来了她的低语声。{/n}“谢谢你，亲爱的，为我们曾拥有的一切。”
languages.original_text: {n}A wan smile appears on Jae's face. Carefully, as though you were made of glass, she touches your cheeks. A whisper wafts toward your ears:{/n} "Thank you, shereen. For everything we had."

traits.locale_text: {n}婕伊脸上露出了惨淡的笑容。她小心翼翼地抚摸着你的脸颊，仿佛你是玻璃做的一般。你耳边传来了她的低语声。{/n}“谢谢你，亲爱的，为我们曾拥有的一切。”
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}ジェイは薄く笑う。まるで、あなたがガラスでできているかのように、彼女は慎重にあなたの頬に触れる。ささやきがあなたの耳に届く。{/n}「ありがとう、シャリーン。これまでのすべてに、感謝するよ」
languages.original_text: {n}A wan smile appears on Jae's face. Carefully, as though you were made of glass, she touches your cheeks. A whisper wafts toward your ears:{/n} "Thank you, shereen. For everything we had."

traits.locale_text: {n}ジェイは薄く笑う。まるで、あなたがガラスでできているかのように、彼女は慎重にあなたの頬に触れる。ささやきがあなたの耳に届く。{/n}「ありがとう、シャリーン。これまでのすべてに、感謝するよ」
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}Jae esboza una sonrisa lánguida. Te toca las mejillas con mucho cuidado, como si estuvieras {mf|hecho|hecha} de cristal. Un susurro flota suavemente hasta tus oídos:{/n} «Gracias, shereen. Por todo lo que hemos tenido».
languages.original_text: {n}A wan smile appears on Jae's face. Carefully, as though you were made of glass, she touches your cheeks. A whisper wafts toward your ears:{/n} "Thank you, shereen. For everything we had."

traits.locale_text: {n}Jae esboza una sonrisa lánguida. Te toca las mejillas con mucho cuidado, como si estuvieras {mf|hecho|hecha} de cristal. Un susurro flota suavemente hasta tus oídos:{/n} «Gracias, shereen. Por todo lo que hemos tenido».
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}Jae sourit tristement. Délicatement, comme si vous étiez {mf|fait|faite} de verre, elle pose les mains sur vos joues. Un murmure flotte jusqu'à vos oreilles :{/n} « Merci, shereen. Pour tout ce que nous avons vécu. »
languages.original_text: {n}A wan smile appears on Jae's face. Carefully, as though you were made of glass, she touches your cheeks. A whisper wafts toward your ears:{/n} "Thank you, shereen. For everything we had."

traits.locale_text: {n}Jae sourit tristement. Délicatement, comme si vous étiez {mf|fait|faite} de verre, elle pose les mains sur vos joues. Un murmure flotte jusqu'à vos oreilles :{/n} « Merci, shereen. Pour tout ce que nous avons vécu. »
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}Ein mattes Lächeln taucht auf Jaes Gesicht auf. Vorsichtig, als würdest du aus Glas bestehen, berührt sie deine Wangen. Ein Flüstern huscht an deinen Ohren vorbei:{/n} "Danke, Shereen. Für alles, was wir erlebt haben."
languages.original_text: {n}A wan smile appears on Jae's face. Carefully, as though you were made of glass, she touches your cheeks. A whisper wafts toward your ears:{/n} "Thank you, shereen. For everything we had."

traits.locale_text: {n}Ein mattes Lächeln taucht auf Jaes Gesicht auf. Vorsichtig, als würdest du aus Glas bestehen, berührt sie deine Wangen. Ein Flüstern huscht an deinen Ohren vorbei:{/n} "Danke, Shereen. Für alles, was wir erlebt haben."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}Jae'ın yüzünde yorgun bir gülümseme peyda oluyor. Sanki camdan yapılmaymışsın gibi dikkatle yanaklarına dokunuyor, kulaklarına doğru bir fısıltı esiyor.{/n} "Teşekkürler şirinim. Yaşadığımız her şey için."
languages.original_text: {n}A wan smile appears on Jae's face. Carefully, as though you were made of glass, she touches your cheeks. A whisper wafts toward your ears:{/n} "Thank you, shereen. For everything we had."

traits.locale_text: {n}Jae'ın yüzünde yorgun bir gülümseme peyda oluyor. Yanaklarına sanki camdan yapılmaymışsın gibi, dikkatle dokunuyor ve kulaklarına doğru bir fısıltı esiyor:{/n} "Teşekkürler şirinim. Yaşadığımız her şey için."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion
